name: TheAtlantic
text:

name: TheAtlantic
text: In July, a celebrated pioneer of early cancer detection died of a mysterious cancer. For his final interviews, he spoke to Madeline Drexler about the burden of knowing he would not live to see his full aspirations become reality. https://t.co/cuat35pGZH

name: TheAtlantic
text: Across the Northern Hemisphere, people are feeling a crisp chill in the evening air, leaves are splashing mountainsides with color, apples and pumpkins are being gathered, and animals are on the move.
